QuestData.Title: Paint it Red!
QuestData.Description: They shot out our engines and we floated here - HERE! Right in the firing line of the enemy!$b$bYou know what to do, $n. Get below decks and man those guns!$b$bShow these scum that they're in OUR line of fire!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use a Gunship Turret to kill 80 Thunder Hold troops and destroy 9 Thunder Hold cannons.
